snippet.title: VERNAL EDGE | RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
After a long wait, Vernal is finally ready to explore the Kingdom of Haricot and unravel the mysteries of this fragmented kingdom!

#metroidvania #pixelart #indiegame 

Get Vernal Edge Now
Steam: https://bit.ly/3zvOp2y
EGS: https://bit.ly/3ThPyCZ
GoG: http://bit.ly/3Igzmho
Nintendo Switch: bit.ly/3T9IDgv
PlayStation: http://bit.ly/3XMfw3g
Xbox: http://bit.ly/3Lpi317
